it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.objects

Class Array3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.objects.Semantics.Base
      • it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.objects.Array3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Semantics.Logger
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MOR3DArray

    public abstract class Array3D
extends Semantics.Base
    Represents an easy ontological mapping structure of a spatial 3D array.

    In particular, it describes 3 components (i.e.: X, Y, Z) and a debugging textual description.
    Moreover, this file contains the generic interface to define the Semantics of such a representation.

    File: it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.objects.Semantics
    Licence: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
    Author: Buoncompagni Luca (luca.buoncompagni@edu.unige.it)
    affiliation: DIBRIS, EMAROLab, University of Genoa.
    date: 06/01/2017
    See Also:
    Array3D.SemanticMap, Semantics, Semantics.Descriptor, Semantics.Base

      • average

        public boolean average(Array3D array)
        Update this representation by averaging all its components with the respective components of the input parameter.
        Parameters:
        array - the X, Y and Z components to be merged with this representation.
        Returns:
        false if an element of this or input array is null. True otherwise.
